attributes.action: Publish the amount collected and the number of payers of all taxes and duties
attributes.additional_details: It is difficult for the public to develop an informed opinion on which taxes should be increased to help pay for the current public sector deficit, e.g. adding 2.5% on VAT against 1% on the %40 income tax rate. Publishing raw figures - e.g. £xxxx collected on the 40% income tax rate from yyyy individuals, £xxxxx collected from fuel duty, at yyy% per unit - would allow us to see for ourselves approximately how much a certain change will bring in, and possibly how many people will be affected.
